content.text:
# Battle of Nybøl

|combatant2 =
|strength1 = 7,000
|strength2 = 14,000
|commander1 =  Hugh Halkett
|commander2 =  Hans Hedemann Friderich Adolph Schleppegrell
|casualties1 = 225 killed & wounded
|casualties2 = 150 killed & wounded
}}
The Battle of Nybøl was fought on the 28 May 1848 between the Danish Army and Germans in Sundeved. The Danes were victorious.
References
Bibliography
* Johs. Nielsen, Treårskrigen 1848-1851 1993
*
